io.smooch.core

Class Conversation

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.smooch.core.Conversation

  • public class Conversation
extends java.lang.Object
    The Conversation provides an interface to interact with the current user's conversation.

    To obtain an instance, use Smooch.getConversation(). Smooch.init(Application, Settings) must have been called prior to retrieving the conversation object.

    To send a message, use sendMessage(Message) with a Message object. Example: Smooch.getConversation().sendMessage(new Message("Hello World!"));

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  Conversation.Delegate
      Delegate for events related to the conversation.

    • Method Detail

      • setDelegate

        public void setDelegate(Conversation.Delegate delegate)
        A delegate object for receiving notifications related to the conversation.

        This delegate will be notified before the delegate set using setSmoochUIDelegate(Delegate)

        Any delegate functions with the form boolean return type will prevent notification of smoochUIDelegate

        See setSmoochUIDelegate(Delegate)

        Parameters:
        delegate - The delegate

      • setSmoochUIDelegate

        public void setSmoochUIDelegate(Conversation.Delegate smoochUIDelegate)
        A delegate object to be used by the smooch-ui package for receiving notifications related to the conversation.

        The primary use of this property is to notify the Smooch UI of changes in the Conversation

        Note that this delegate will be notified after the delegate set using setDelegate(Delegate)

        See setDelegate(Delegate)

        Parameters:
        smoochUIDelegate - The smoochUIDelegate

      • getMessages

        public java.util.List<Message> getMessages()
        The list of Message objects representing the conversation.
        Returns:
        Unmodifiable list of Message objects

      • getUnreadCount

        public int getUnreadCount()
        Count of unread messages in the conversation.

        The primary use of this property is to be able to display an indicator when the conversation has unread messages.

        Returns:
        The unread message count

      • markAllAsRead

        public void markAllAsRead()
        Marks all unread messages as read.

        Marks all unread messages as read, and notifies that the unread count changed.

      • markAsRead

        public void markAsRead(Message message)
        Marks an unread message as read.

        Marks an unread message as read, and notifies that the unread count changed.

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(Message message)
        Adds a new message to the conversation.

        For each message added using sendMessage, a notification will be fired indicating the success or failure status of the upload.

        Parameters:
        message - The message to send

      • retryMessage

        public Message retryMessage(Message message)
        Retries a message that failed to send.

        The failed message will be removed from the message list, and a new message will be constructed with the same text as the failed message. A notification will be fired indicating the success or failure status of the upload.

        Parameters:
        message - The failed message
        Returns:
        The sent message

      • addMessage

        public void addMessage(Message message)
        Adds a new message to the conversation without sending it.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to add

      • removeMessage

        public void removeMessage(Message message)
        Removes a failed or unsent message from the conversation.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to remove

      • uploadImage

        public void uploadImage(android.graphics.Bitmap image,
                        SmoochCallback callback)
        Uploads a user image to the conversation.

        For each image upload, provided SmoochCallback will be called with status code, error and the resulting message

        Parameters:
        image - The image to upload
        callback - The callback, to be called with SmoochCallback.Response getData() of type Message, null in case of error

      • processPayment

        public void processPayment(CreditCard creditCard,
                           MessageAction action)
        Processes a credit card payment.

        Parameters:
        creditCard - The credit card object
        action - The message action

      • triggerAction

        public void triggerAction(MessageAction action)
        Triggers message action resulting from a click.

        Parameters:
        action - The message action

      • loadCardSummary

        public void loadCardSummary()
        Loads billing info (if exists) to display last4 in credit form.

      • postback

        public void postback(MessageAction action,
                     SmoochCallback callback)
        Triggers MessageAction postback.

      • smoochShown

        public void smoochShown()
        Notifies the delegate when Smooch Conversation is shown

        Used by the smooch-ui package to notify the Conversation.Delegate when Smooch is shown

      • smoochHidden

        public void smoochHidden()
        Notifies the delegate when Smooch Conversation is hidden

        Used by the smooch-ui package to notify the Conversation.Delegate when Smooch is hidden

      • isSmoochShown

        public boolean isSmoochShown()
        Returns true if the Smooch UI is currently shown
        Returns:
        true if the Smooch UI is currently shown, false otherwise
